quality_assessment: Documentation page does not exist - complete work distribution documentation is missing

issues.description: Documentation file does not exist - all work distribution features are completely undocumented
issues.fix_suggestion: Create comprehensive documentation page covering all work distribution features: JSON/command input sources, JSONPath extraction, filtering, sorting, pagination, and deduplication

issues.description: No documentation for JSON and command-based input sources
issues.fix_suggestion: Document how to specify input sources using 'input' field with JSON files and command outputs

issues.description: No documentation for JSONPath expressions for item extraction
issues.fix_suggestion: Document 'json_path' field with examples showing how to extract work items from nested JSON structures using JSONPath syntax (e.g., '$.items[*]', '$.data.results[*]')

issues.description: No documentation for filtering with boolean expressions
issues.fix_suggestion: Document 'filter' field with examples of boolean expressions to selectively process work items (e.g., 'item.score >= 5', 'item.status == "pending"')

issues.description: No documentation for sorting by field values
issues.fix_suggestion: Document 'sort_by' field with examples showing ascending and descending sorts (e.g., 'item.priority DESC', 'item.created_at ASC')

issues.description: No documentation for offset and limit pagination
issues.fix_suggestion: Document 'offset' and 'limit' (or 'max_items') fields for processing subsets of work items, useful for testing and incremental processing

issues.description: No documentation for deduplication by field
issues.fix_suggestion: Document deduplication mechanism using 'distinct' field to ensure unique work items (e.g., distinct: "item.id" or distinct: "item.path"). Note: The correct field name is 'distinct', not 'deduplicate_by'

issues.description: No complete workflow examples showing work distribution in action
issues.fix_suggestion: Add comprehensive examples: (1) simple JSONPath extraction, (2) filtering and sorting combined, (3) pagination for large datasets, (4) deduplication scenario

issues.description: No documentation on how work distribution integrates with map phase configuration
issues.fix_suggestion: Explain how input, json_path, filter, sort_by, and max_items work together in the map phase configuration block

issues.description: No documentation explaining the order of operations in the data pipeline
issues.fix_suggestion: Document the processing order: 1) JSONPath extraction, 2) Filtering, 3) Sorting, 4) Deduplication (distinct), 5) Offset, 6) Limit

improvement_suggestions: Create the documentation page with clear structure: Introduction, Input Sources, JSONPath Extraction, Filtering, Sorting, Pagination, Deduplication, Complete Examples
Include practical examples for each feature showing real-world use cases
Add a 'Processing Pipeline Order' section explaining the sequence of operations
Add troubleshooting section for common JSONPath and filtering errors
Cross-reference related pages: overview, setup phase, parallel execution
Use MkDocs Material admonitions for tips, warnings, and best practices
Include a comparison table showing different input source options
Add diagrams showing how work items flow through extraction, filtering, and distribution
Document performance considerations for large work item sets
Clarify null value handling in deduplication
Explain filter evaluation behavior for non-existent fields

metadata.validation_focus: Check work item management, JSONPath usage, filtering, and sorting are documented
metadata.analysis_note: File does not exist - this is a complete documentation gap for work distribution features
